Title: El
Description:
["The survivors of a global atomic war live in a city dedicated to the survival of the human race. El Miles is part of a group in charge with enforcing the law. While the male members sexually torture suspected female members of the Black Widows, El is in charge with protecting a young and pretty pop singer who is openly trying to seduce her. But it could be that El's reality is simply one big illusion.", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Staff: [['Takahashi, Takeo', 'Storyboard, Animation Director, Art Director, Character Design'], ['ELF Corporation', 'Original Creator']]
